channel.title: Is it safe to upgrade Gateway while Workstation is running?
channel.description: 1. Is it safe to upgrade Gateway using `upgrade-nonroot` while Workstation is running? When some important gw packages like `tor` or `whonix-firewall` are being upgraded, is there any chance for IP leak from Workstation? 2. Is it safe to perform `sudo apt autoremove`? Should I do this or I should just type `upgrade-nonroot` and forget?
